channel.title: CVE Feed for OSIsoft -- PI Web API
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OSIsoft -- PI Web API

item.title: CVE-2021-43549|2024-08-04T04:03:07.669Z -- osisoft -- pi%20web%20api
item.description: A remote authenticated attacker with write access to a PI Server could trick a user into interacting with a PI Web API endpoint and redirect them to a malicious website. As a result, a victim may disclose sensitive information to the attacker or be provided with false information.
